name: Lugaidh mac Conn

attributes.attribute: foster son and enemy of the Munster ruler Ailill Olom
defeated by Lugaidh at the battle of Mag Mucramhan
tried to apologize to the Munster king
infected Lugaidh with his poisoned breath

sources: Monaghan, Patricia. The Encyclopedia of Celtic Mythology and Folklore. Checkmark Books, 2008.
text: Fostered by Conn and an adversary of Ailill Olom, the ruler of Munster, was Lugaidh mac Conn. In a critical battle waged in Mag Mucramhan, Lugaidh vanquished Ailill's army. Subsequently, Lugaidh attempted to reconcile with the Munster monarch, however, Ailill's poisoned breath proved fatal and Lugaidh met his demise.
